html: These two verses describe the catastrophic events associated with the Lord's second coming. The Savior quoted part of verse 20 in two revelations given to Joseph Smith (see D&C 49:23; 88:87). Oliver Cowdery paraphrased the same verse in noting which scriptures the angel Moroni said were soon to be fulfilled (see MA, Apr. 1835, pp. 111-12). The Prophet Joseph Smith taught that the events spoken of in verse 20 were soon to occur as the Second Coming rapidly approached (TPJS, pp. 29, 71).
